channel.title: Major client help!
channel.description:
I need alot of help here... Im using the lost universe source and here are my problems:
1. Im using Project Fubergen client [EDIT] V8.1.0 but I don't know how to change the source the client uses, (so that i can use that client with a different source.)
2. Im not aware of how to change the name on the jframe...(it says project fubergen) and Im trying to edit it.
3. There was an anti leech on the client, so I removed it but I still seem to be having trouble changing some icons like the logout button (which is messed up) and the HP icon (its a custom yellow one)
That's all...Im a beginner coder please don't flame me. All your help is much appreciated.

item.description:
@chargerz wrote:

Lol then why’d you quote me?
I didnt see your post before the edit that helps

On topic- problem fixed yay!

item.title: Major client help!
item.dc:creator: @Sir_roju Sir roju
item.description:
@Sir_roju wrote:

could you post picture of logout thingy? v8.3.0 doesnt use source and its not integrated with any server.only in that version, i think, it was in gui.java or client.java, search for runelife.no-ip.org, and change it to localhost.
